articles.description: Follow live text updates from day one of the fifth Test between India and England in Dharamsala.
articles.title: England win toss & bat first against India in fifth Test

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says the Champions League holders have become a team that "believes" in Europe.
articles.title: 'A team that believes' - can anyone stop Man City 'juggernaut'?

articles.description: Real Madrid reach the Champions League quarter-finals as Vinicius Junior makes RB Leipzig pay for their missed chances in a 2-1 aggregate win.
articles.title: Real Madrid hold off Leipzig to reach quarter-finals

articles.description: England flew out to India as unfancied underdogs, but, against a backdrop of assassination and unrest, cliched a comeback series win.
articles.title: Death, disaster and redemption - England's tumultuous tour of India

articles.description: Ex-UFC champion Francis Ngannou clashes with Tyson Fury and says he is "just getting started" in boxing before his heavyweight fight with Anthony Joshua.
articles.title: Anthony Joshua v Francis Ngannou: Boxing novice clashes with Tyson Fury at news conference

articles.description: Stina Blackstenius scores a hat-trick as Arsenal reach the Women's League Cup final by beating Aston Villa.
articles.title: Arsenal beat Villa to reach Women's League Cup final

articles.description: Max Verstappen says his father is "not a liar" in the wake of his claim that the controversy around Christian Horner is "driving people apart".
articles.title: Max Verstappen says father Jos is 'not a liar' after Christian Horner controversy

articles.description: Erling Haaland scores again as Manchester City beat Copenhagen 6-2 on aggregate to reach the Champions League quarter-finals.
articles.title: Man City cruise into quarters as Haaland nets again

articles.description: Chelsea manager Emma Hayes says Sam Kerr has the club's "full support" after being charged with racially aggravated harassment of a London police officer.
articles.title: Chelsea's Kerr has club's 'full support' - Hayes

articles.description: Gareth Southgate is an option if Manchester United replace Erik ten Hag, Joelinton wants to stay in the Premier League if he leaves Newcastle, plus more.
articles.title: Man Utd ponder Southgate as manager - Thursday's gossip
